name: Email forwarding
description: Forward tasks to hello@dysperse.com and they'll appear as tasks

name: iCal feed
description: Let Dysperse tasks appear in other calendar apps

name: Spotify
description: Display what's currently playing in your sidebar

name: Google Calendar
description: Sync your calendar events with collections

name: Apple Calendar
description: Sync your calendar events with collections

params.name: webcal:// link
helper: Navigate to icloud.com and login with your Apple ID
Click on the share button next to the calendar you want to sync
Turn on "Public Calendar," copy the URL, and paste it here

name: Canvas LMS
description: Import assignments and quizzes from Canvas

params.name: e.g. something.instructure.com
helper: Enter the domain of your Canvas website

params.name: Access token
helper: Navigate to your Canvas settings (Account > Settings)
Scroll down to the "Approved Integrations" section
Click on the "+ New Access Token" button
IMPORTANT: Do not set an expiration date, as this could break the integration in the future
Click on the "Generate Token" button, and copy the token

name: Outlook Calendar
description: Sync your calendar events with collections

name: GitHub
description: See open pull requests and issues assigned to you

name: Canvas calendar
description: Displays items your Canvas calendar. Not needed if you've already connected Canvas LMS

params.name: Canvas Calendar URL
helper: Open Canvas in a web browser
Scroll down and click on the "Calendar Feed" button in the bottom right corner
Copy the URL and paste it here

name: Notion
description: Connect your databases to dysperse collections.

name: Gmail
description: Starred emails will be added to your collections
